Gas_Trap.help: This trap emits poisonous smoke from an arcane incense. The fumes from this incense blur the victim's senses, reducing his accuracy for a time.
Gas_Trap.targetHelp: The Gas Trap has reduced your Accuracy!

messages.victimHit: The Gas Trap has reduced your Accuracy!

Repulsor.help: This small device has been enchanted with a spell of polarity. Any foe who comes close to it will be struck with a powerful repulsion wave that can fling them away from the artifact.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Slow_Field.help: This artifact calls on the deities of speed to curse all who enter it. Those in the area of effect have their speed and attack rate reduced.
Slow_Field.victimHit: You have been slowed down by the trap!

Tesla_Cage.help: This device is charged with an entrapment spell that will automatically trigger when an enemy comes near. If successful, the victim is immobilized in a tesla field for a short time.
Tesla_Cage.targetHelp: The Tesla Cage is holding you helpless.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
The Tesla Cage drains some of your Endurance!

Thurisaz_Rune.help: All foes that pass near this rune will get blown to smithereens.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Gas_Trap.help: The Gas Emitter provides a cost-effective non-lethal addition to an integrated part of base defense. The system's chemical agents enter the nervous system to impair vision and coordination functions, reducing the victim's accuracy for a moderate duration.
Gas_Trap.targetHelp: The Gas Trap has reduced your Accuracy!

messages.victimHit: The Gas Trap has reduced your Accuracy!

Repulsor.help: The MERF (Micro-Emitter Repulsor Field) combines the best qualities of unobtrusive installation with high-energy repulsion generation. When activated, the MERF releases a powerful non-damaging charge capable of flinging opponents away.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Slow_Field.help: The field emitted by this device inhibits motion of all foes within it. Movement speed and attack rate are reduced while in the area of effect.
Slow_Field.victimHit: You have been slowed down by the trap!

Tesla_Cage.help: TESLA-1 is the security professional's preferred solution to non-lethal restraint. Discreet enough to be placed in the finest offices, the TESLA-1 is automated to detect intruders and hold them within a powerful tesla field. When seconds are vital for your security response, count on the TESLA-1!
Tesla_Cage.targetHelp: The Tesla Cage is holding you helpless.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
The Tesla Cage drains some of your Endurance!

Trip_Mine.help: This is a field-issue M-110 PDM, a small virtually undetectable munition designed to discourage and delay pursuers. It is fitted with a sophisticated sensor system programmed to discriminate between friendly and hostile targets. It does moderate damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Explode.help: When Turrets are destroyed, they tend to explode, but deal no damage.
